1.Nie pisz z capsem (ani z shiftem :P) 2.Zwracaj uwagę na ortografię, bez rażących błędów! 3.Nie obrażaj innych 4.Nie używaj "??,!!, emot" w zbyt dużej ilości 5.Nie proś o zaproszenie kogoś na Live! 6.Bez "zagrasz/grałaś/znasz/ 7.Bez pozdrów mnie 8.Nie pytaj kiedy następny live i kiedy koniec live! 9.Zakaz odliczania przed livem, godzina podawana jest orientacyjna i live może się przesunąć o pare minut. 10.Chcesz, żebym Ci odpowiedziała to nie używaj jaskrawego koloru nicku, gdyż nie jestem w stanie ich czytać. 11.Chat służy do komunikacji między mną, a Wami, chcesz sobie pogadać z koleżkami - idz na priv. 12.Zakaz reklamowania (Kanałów YouTube,Innych LIVE, i innych) 13.Masz program blokujący reklamy? Nie proszę Cie abyś go usunął ale uszanuj moją pracę i nie chwal się nim na czacie. Reklamy są i będą, prawda jest taka, że też byś chciał różne gry na live. Za coś muszę je kupić. Obejrzenie reklamy nic Cię nie kosztuje. Doceń czas, który poświęcam na to co robię.
![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/9tAC095.png"Pytania") ![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/RakWbJl.png"p") [![img](http://i.imgur.com/jprmnx5.png)](http://kinaczewa.pl/faq/sprzet/)
1.Co sądzisz o... (tu wstaw tytuł gry, która jeszcze nie wyszła)? Nie grałam, nie oceniam, nie mam zdania. Za często zapowiedzi różnią się od efektu końcowego. 2.Co pijesz? Jeśli się uśmiecham pije coś dobrego, jeśli się krzywię pije coś niedobrego ;) 3.Dlaczego na kamerce jest tak ciemno? Pewnie dlatego, że nie jestem fanką światła :) taki ze mnie wampirek troszeczkę. 4.Co mnie ominęło? Zapewne nic zwłaszcza jak wbijasz po 40 min live, specjalnie czekałam na Ciebie i nic nie robiłam ;) 5.Do której live? A co źle Ci że jest? :P A tak serio zazwyczaj nie planuje końca live, robię swoje i kończę kiedy czuje, że na to czas. 6.Kiedy odcinek z...? Będzie kiedy będzie, weekend ma swoją rozpiskę w tygodniu daje znać na fb kiedy odcinki. 7.Zrobisz serie/ live z...? Jak planuje jakieś serie to zazwyczaj Was informuje wiec jeśli nie mówiłam o grze o która pytasz to w planach jej raczej nie mam. 8.Kiedy live z... (wstaw sobie nazwę gry)? Nie planuje live, w 99% są one spontaniczne, czasami zapowiedziane dzień wcześniej więc nie wiem :P
livestream.media_description_md:
1.Nie pisz z capsem (ani z shiftem :P)

2.Zwracaj uwagę na ortografię, bez rażących błędów!

3.Nie obrażaj innych

4.Nie używaj "??,!!, emot" w zbyt dużej ilości

5.Nie proś o zaproszenie kogoś na Live!

6.Bez "zagrasz/grałaś/znasz/

7.Bez pozdrów mnie

8.Nie pytaj kiedy następny live i kiedy koniec live!

9.Zakaz odliczania przed livem, godzina podawana jest orientacyjna i live może się przesunąć o pare minut.

10.Chcesz, żebym Ci odpowiedziała to nie używaj jaskrawego koloru nicku, gdyż nie jestem w stanie ich czytać.

11.Chat służy do komunikacji między mną, a Wami, chcesz sobie pogadać z koleżkami - idz na priv.

12.Zakaz reklamowania (Kanałów YouTube,Innych LIVE, i innych)

13.Masz program blokujący reklamy? Nie proszę Cie abyś go usunął ale uszanuj moją pracę i nie chwal się nim na czacie. Reklamy są i będą, prawda jest taka, że też byś chciał różne gry na live. Za coś muszę je kupić. Obejrzenie reklamy nic Cię nie kosztuje. Doceń czas, który poświęcam na to co robię.



1.Co sądzisz o... (tu wstaw tytuł gry, która jeszcze nie wyszła)? Nie grałam, nie oceniam, nie mam zdania. Za często zapowiedzi różnią się od efektu końcowego.

2.Co pijesz? Jeśli się uśmiecham pije coś dobrego, jeśli się krzywię pije coś niedobrego ;)

3.Dlaczego na kamerce jest tak ciemno? Pewnie dlatego, że nie jestem fanką światła :) taki ze mnie wampirek troszeczkę.

4.Co mnie ominęło? Zapewne nic zwłaszcza jak wbijasz po 40 min live, specjalnie czekałam na Ciebie i nic nie robiłam ;)

5.Do której live? A co źle Ci że jest? :P A tak serio zazwyczaj nie planuje końca live, robię swoje i kończę kiedy czuje, że na to czas.

6.Kiedy odcinek z...? Będzie kiedy będzie, weekend ma swoją rozpiskę w tygodniu daje znać na fb kiedy odcinki.

7.Zrobisz serie/ live z...? Jak planuje jakieś serie to zazwyczaj Was informuje wiec jeśli nie mówiłam o grze o która pytasz to w planach jej raczej nie mam.

8.Kiedy live z... (wstaw sobie nazwę gry)? Nie planuje live, w 99% są one spontaniczne, czasami zapowiedziane dzień wcześniej więc nie wiem :P

## Witam !
Nazywam się Adrian mam 26 lat jestem Ratownikiem Medycznym i pasjonuję się grami komputerowymi. Zapraszam do spędzenia ze mną czasu przy grze i dobrej muzyce ! _________________________________________ Zapraszam też do odwiedzenia stron How2Play gdzie można uzyskać wiele pożytecznych informacji ze świata League of Legends i innych gier komputerowych: [Facebook](http://facebook.com/how2play) / [How2Play.pl](http://how2play.pl) / [Streamerzy H2P](http://www.hitbox.tv/team/how2play) [![](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/â€¦1808743-5535367802126180721-n-png_5400cd2ba00a0.png)](http://how2play.pl) [![](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/paypal-donate-button-png_5400cde20d4a6.png)](https://streamtip.com/h/florektv) [![](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/facebook-logo-png_5400cea4acbaf.png)](https://www.facebook.com/StreamPanic)

Podobał Ci się stream i dobrze się bawiłeś ?
Zostaw follow, usłyszysz co na ten temat myśli Amumu ! Możesz też w prosty sposób odwdzięczyć się za stream ! Wystarczy, że klikniesz przycisk [Donate](hhttps://streamtip.com/h/florektv) powyżej i dasz mi napiwek za moją pracę, kwota nie ma znaczenia. W podziękowaniu zobaczysz swój nick na liście osób wspierających stream wyświetlany na żywo i zabawny głos Brolafa lub Gragasa. Zebrane pieniądze przeznaczam na ulepszanie mojego internetowego show. Aktualnie zbieram na mikrofon [Blue Yeti](http://www.ceneo.pl/15436320). Zebrałem 58zł/500zł. _____________________________________________ Cowabunga dudes !!!

livestream.media_description:
Synek z Górnego Śląska, taki tam, od filmików po Śląsku na JuTubie znany, jako ***FreakyGamerzz***.   Dla subskrajberów nowe ikony - **niklausgruba, niklauskappa, niklauswodzionka**

--> [**Mój JuTub**](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnl8wEwDayK72E4Jodun7ZQ)
--> [**Fejsbuk**](https://www.facebook.com/FreakyGamerzz)
--> [**Tłiter**](https://twitter.com/FreakyGamerzz)

[![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/donuj-png_53aad3d8bef7e.png)](https://streamtip.me/t/lordscaremonger)                            
 ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/wez-to-png_53aa07555ea94.png) ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/sprzyntywewe-png_54209309d74e8.png)

**Jak należy się zachowywać, aby była dobra zabawa?**

- nie przeklinać nadmiernie bez powodu

- nie drzeć buzi za pomocą shifta i capslocka

- tak, czytam czat, jeśli któryś raz z rzędu nie
odpowiedziałem na pytanie, znaczy jest głupie

- nie spamować 

- jeżeli chcesz zareklamować swojego streama,
stronę, kanał YT, zapytaj wcześniej grzecznie
jak cywilizowany człowiek

- zachowuj się jak światły człowiek ze środka
Europy, nie obrażaj streamera oraz innych
czatowiczów

- nie spojleruj przebiegu fabuły gier, książek, oraz filmów, dla takich ludzi jest specjalne miejsce w piekle

- oszczędź sobie dzielenia się przemyśleniami typu "hahahaa jak on śmiesznie mówi, to polak?". Zonk, jestem Ślązakiem, godóm po ślónsku, mówię też po polsku.

- łamanie powyższych "reguł" poskutkuje timem, 
w razie dalszego naruszania banem lub perm banem na ip
livestream.media_description_md:
Synek z Górnego Śląska, taki tam, od filmików po Śląsku na JuTubie znany, jako FreakyGamerzz. Dla subskrajberów nowe ikony - niklausgruba, niklauskappa, niklauswodzionka

--> Mój JuTub --> Fejsbuk --> Tłiter


Jak należy się zachowywać, aby była dobra zabawa?

  • nie przeklinać nadmiernie bez powodu

  • nie drzeć buzi za pomocą shifta i capslocka

  • tak, czytam czat, jeśli któryś raz z rzędu nie odpowiedziałem na pytanie, znaczy jest głupie

  • nie spamować

  • jeżeli chcesz zareklamować swojego streama, stronę, kanał YT, zapytaj wcześniej grzecznie jak cywilizowany człowiek

  • zachowuj się jak światły człowiek ze środka Europy, nie obrażaj streamera oraz innych czatowiczów

  • nie spojleruj przebiegu fabuły gier, książek, oraz filmów, dla takich ludzi jest specjalne miejsce w piekle

  • oszczędź sobie dzielenia się przemyśleniami typu "hahahaa jak on śmiesznie mówi, to polak?". Zonk, jestem Ślązakiem, godóm po ślónsku, mówię też po polsku.

  • łamanie powyższych "reguł" poskutkuje timem, w razie dalszego naruszania banem lub perm banem na ip

#The Box évolue et a besoin de votre soutien, alors cliquez sur Follow pour voir toujours plus de nouveau contenu. **Qui sommes-nous ?**
Des potes, des jeux et du fun ! Au programme : League of Legends (mais pas trop), des jeux en solo ou en coop, de la console, du retro et des tests de jeu !
Le plus ? Vous jouez avec nous !

**Règlement du tchat**
- Pas de langage offensant ou d'insultes;
- Pas de liens externes;
- Les majuscules sont autorisées mais dans une certaine limite (on ne flood pas en majuscule);
- Les streamers présents sont là pour vous divertir et répondront à tous vos messages, mais il est interdit d'avoir un comportement inapproprié envers eux;
- Nous n'abusons pas des kicks et des bans mais si nécessaires ils seront très bien utilisés.

**Hey du!** Mein Name ist der Fr3aky - oder auch Phil! Ich bin 19 Jahre jung, komme aus Rostock an der wunderschönen Ostsee und bin leidenschaftlicher Gamer den es von YouTube erst zu Twitch und dann zu Hitbox verschlagen hat. Mittlerweile streame ich fast täglich und lade einige Ausschnitte davon auch auf meinem YouTube Kanal hoch. Hier wirst du viele verschiedene Games finden, von Retro zu neuen Games ist alles dabei. Außerdem finden auf diesem Stream Channel die MCB (Minecraft Beef) Events statt! :)
**Wie kannst du mich unterstützen?**

![Fr3aky](http://s29.postimg.org/o4at2t06v/Subscriber.png)
- Klicke auf Subscribe und unterstütze mich finanziell damit. Außerdem bekommst du dann die saucoolen Smileys!
- Da ich Partner bin **SCHALTET EUREN ADBLOCKER AUS**. Durch die Werbung die ich zwischendurch schalte finanziere ich diesen Stream!
- Lies bitte die Regeln, mach dir einen Account und beteilige dich am Chat!
- Teile meinen Stream zum Beispiel auf Twitter oder Facebook um mehr Leute auf uns aufmerksam zu machen!
- Hinterlasse gerne eine Donation. Deine Nachricht wird dann im Stream angezeigt + ein Sound gespielt! (Klicke auf den Donation Button)

![img](http://edge.vie.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/mariodimak2-png_5367070c2feb1.png) >**Who is Dimak? What does he do?** Dimak isnt a single person. Dimak is a league of streamers who stream games for your entertainment. >**How big is Dimak? Whats it like?** We have a wide variety of people who stream here, all with their own tastes in games and style of gameplay. Dimak carries heavy diversity and we're proud of it >**How long has Dimak been around?** Dimak has been around THREE YEARS! (4 years if you count December 2010)

"Streaming done right since 2010"
"A community for you"

We pride ourselves on the fact we've been around for so very long, and we're still very active. Every day we continue to make small or big changes that benefit both the viewers and/or our producers. Our focus is on our community, then our own producers, because without you, the viewer, where would we be? >**Why do you guys at Dimak do this?** We at Dimak believe that streaming what we play adds a social element and creates a whole new level of gaming, not just for the streamer, but for you, the viewer! >**What if it feels like Im just watching random games?** The point of Dimak is to create a community, a family in a sense, so we can just chill, chat and enjoy video games, bringing meaning to doing random crap on the internet. You do that random crap with us! :) >**What if Im shy or I dont think I'll be welcome?** We're always looking for more people to spend time and enjoy ourselves with. So long as you don't cause trouble and obey basic chat rules then you will never have a problem! We pride ourselves on our long-standing community and welcome new people into the fold.

![img](http://edge.vie.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/general-cannon-png_536711db8f83a.png)

#Social networking links + Misc info [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/DimakTV) [Youtube](http://youtube.com/Dimakstreams) [Twitter](http://twitter.com/Dimakstreams)
#Contact admin? ldimak@hotmail.com (email) dimak_icicle (skype)
#Donation link ! [![Dimak Bonds!](http://edge.vie.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/btn-donatecc-lg-gif_536710ed69ec2.gif "Support Dimak!")](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=6VABNWCCV3N6N&lc=USâ€¦¤cy_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted)
livestream.media_description_md:
Who is Dimak? What does he do?
Dimak isnt a single person. Dimak is a league of streamers who stream games for your entertainment.

How big is Dimak? Whats it like?
We have a wide variety of people who stream here, all with their own tastes in games and style of gameplay. Dimak carries heavy diversity and we're proud of it

How long has Dimak been around?
Dimak has been around THREE YEARS! (4 years if you count December 2010)

"Streaming done right since 2010"
"A community for you"

We pride ourselves on the fact we've been around for so very long, and we're still very active. Every day we continue to make small or big changes that benefit both the viewers and/or our producers. Our focus is on our community, then our own producers, because without you, the viewer, where would we be?

Why do you guys at Dimak do this?
We at Dimak believe that streaming what we play adds a social element and creates a whole new level of gaming, not just for the streamer, but for you, the viewer!

What if it feels like Im just watching random games? The point of Dimak is to create a community, a family in a sense, so we can just chill, chat and enjoy video games, bringing meaning to doing random crap on the internet. You do that random crap with us! :)

What if Im shy or I dont think I'll be welcome?
We're always looking for more people to spend time and enjoy ourselves with. So long as you don't cause trouble and obey basic chat rules then you will never have a problem! We pride ourselves on our long-standing community and welcome new people into the fold.

livestream.media_status: Let's Stream Payday 2 Hotline Miami DLC with Mah-Dry-Bread (720HD 60fps English)
livestream.media_description:
# Rules: -No homophobic slurs. Be cautious with Ableist and Racist comments. - Debates are fine, but don't start fights. - Respect the moderators. They take time out of their days to keep talking in the chat fun without getting paid. - Text speak abbreviations like "lol" and "omg" are banned. - Don't talk about Shrek. Don't ask about Shrek either. You can't even ask about this rule. - Don't post your own stream or channel link without asking permission from myself or a moderator. - Please stay on topic. Talk about either what the people in the stream are talking about, or the game being played. Long off topic conversations just leave the hosts with nothing to respond to in the chat causing it to be less enjoyable for everyone involved. - Americanised spellings are censored in the chat for the sake of common literacy. Just because one country decides to legally adopt their typos doesn't mean the rest of the world should have to suffer through it. - Although we have viewers from all over the world, please understand this is an English speaking stream and only type in English unless specifically asked otherwise by the host. - There is no excuse to replace “You” and “Are” with “U” and “R”. Please spell things correctly to the best of your ability. - All of these streams are recorded and uploaded to my Youtube accounts. That means if the chat is on screen and you say something personal, it will be there on Youtube for everyone to see. Please watch what you say. This is the internet, please don't say anything you wouldn't want the whole world to know.
Like the stream and want to promote it? Click [This Link](http://ctt.ec/ARd3K) to automatically tweet for people to join in the fun!

# FAQ: **Q.** Who are you? **A.** Hailing from Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. Mah-Dry-Bread from [http://www.youtube.com/user/medraut567](http://www.youtube.com/user/medraut567) and [http://www.youtube.com/user/thewalkthroughcorner](http://www.youtube.com/user/thewalkthroughcorner) ! Known as the creator of [Screenshot Warfare](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5E54142F04A35EC8), for doing a video a day since March 30th 2011 (3 years and 6 months at the time of writing this), for making many Let's Plays, Reviews, [Flash Trash](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXmhjzME06PHfhx_3tQNr-yaqvszfJ2m8), [Creepypasta Readings](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXmhjzME06PEN4iZJrhM8Cv6-8UB4QZbL), and other miscellaneous videos.

I also Co-Host a weekly charity stream with [Schaly](http://www.youtube.com/user/Schaly ) and [Whattageek](http://www.youtube.com/user/Whattageek ) every single Friday from 5 PM till 7 PM EST called [Pass The Controller Please](http://www.twitch.tv/passthecontrollerplease). Make sure to check it out!

**Q** What is your day job? **A** [My Youtube Channel](http://www.youtube.com/user/medraut567)

**Q** What are your system specs? **A** You can find them as well as a list of every game I've Let's Played and every game I plan to Let's Play right [here!](http://mahdrybread.freeforums.org/software-specs-and-lps-t10.html)

**Q.** Can I play a game with you? **A.** Sure! The best way to play a game with me is to add me on Steam. The link to my steam is: [http://steamcommunity.com/id/MahDryBread](http://steamcommunity.com/id/MahDryBread) You can also keep up with when I'm streaming by joining the [Steam Group](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/MahDrysFlock).

**Q.** What's with all the colour coordination? **A.** All the regulars of my channel have different colours that correspond to chat colours. That way we can easily see who is cheering for who at a glance. Show your support and change your colour!

Mah-Dry-Bread – Purple BrandonWar0 - Snapishhippo – Pink Schaly – Blue Secret Firi – Red Whattageek – Green Supereffector -

**Q.** When do you stream? **A.** No specific time, but I usually aim to stream at least three times a week.

**Q.** Can I be a moderator? **A.** Until the stream chat becomes very large (100+ people on average) I'm keeping moderator status to people I know personally. Once we pass the 100 person mark, I'll be picking new moderators based on who is active in the chat, keeps things fun, and I feel is safe to give moderator status to. Please don't ask to be a moderator. If I need one and I think you'll make a good one, I'll be the one asking you.

**Q.** How old are you? You look 50 and sound 12. **A.** I'm 22.

**Q.** Why do you call it “Zed”? It's “Zee”! **A.** The United States is the only country that says "Zee". Just let it go.

# Donations, Patreon, and Store: My [Patreon](http://www.patreon.com/MahDryBread) account is a place where you can pledge to donate a monthly recurring amount of money for rewards starting from $1 a month. These help support my life as well as the upkeep for the show. This is my fulltime job so any extra bit of money you can spare is VERY much appreciated.

If you donate money to me via paypal the money will go into the following things:

-Video games to stream -Computer Components -New Equipment (Lights, headsets, ect) -Costs for hosting servers (like the [Community Minecraft Server](http://mahdrybread.freeforums.org/server-information-and-rules-t2677.html)) -Helping support me so I can continue to do what I love (And hopefully keep you entertained in the process).
[Tip Jar](https://streamtip.com/h/mah-dry-bread)

If you'd like to donate some money to me but get something directly in turn, I make $1 off each T-shirt I sell. Feel free to check them out on my [Spreadshirt Market](http://mahdrybread.spreadshirt.com)

# Can I follow you?: Yes, but don't tell me. It's sexier that way.

[Facebook Fanpage](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mah-Dry-Bread/115639781786787?ref=ts&fref=ts)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MahDryBread)

# Tumblr Quotes: Pass the Controller Please, the weekly charity stream I'm a part of is now on Tumblr! If you go [Here](http://ptcpoutofcontext.tumblr.com/) you can read all of our weirdest quotes taken completely out of context.

Know of a good one? [Submit it here!](http://ptcpoutofcontext.tumblr.com/submit)

Dopefish is a character that first appeared in Commander Keen IV, and then appeared as an easter egg in several other games.

What is this? ========== **Student StarCraft AI Tournament** (SSCAI) is an educational event, held annually since 2011. Students of _Artificial Intelligence_ and _Computer Science_ submit the bots programmed in C++ or Java using BWAPI to play 1v1 SC:Brood War matches.
**Live Streams**: Bots play against each other 24/7 and all the games are streamed here.
Tournament Website ================ You can check out the **rules**, **statistics**, **achievements**, **tutorials**, **maps**, or **submit** your own bot at: [www.sscaitournament.com](www.sscaitournament.com).

# Witam !
Nazywam się Łukasz mam 25 lat. Zawodowo jestem kierowcą a po pracy pykam w LoLa.  
Często pytacie jaka to dywizja ? Moim największym osiągnięciem było wbicie plat 1 w poprzednim sezonie na west . Chciałbym tu także zaznaczyć ze nie gram tutaj dla pkt . Każda gra jest dla mnie kolejną lekcją.
Dlaczego stremuje ? W zasadzie głownie dla zabawy bo co? bo i tak gram ! Drugą rzeczą mogą być pieniądze których i tak tutaj wielkich nie ma i fejm kappa !
Naprawdę wolę mieć garstka normalnych widzów to mi wystarczy!
# W miarę możliwości postaram się rozwijać stream . Organizować konkursy dla wiernych fanów!  To wszyskto z czasem.
A to wszyskto mam nadzieje w kulturalnej przyjaznej atmosferze . Jeżeli zamierzasz psuć ten porządek WYJDZ!

# Jeżeli chcesz pomóc:
- Zostaw followa na hitboxie 
- Polub stronę na  (tam są podawane infromacje o stramie konkursach itd) [**Facebooku**](http://www.facebook.com/TheHuue"facebook")

- Możesz także przekazać [**dotacje**](https://streamtip.com/h/thehuue"dotacja") Twój nick zostanie umieszony na lisie daroczyńców.
- Odwiedzaj często :D


Wszystkie pytania do mnie kierujcie  na facebooka ! Nie koniecznie natury Lola !

Hi,
mein Name ist Moep bzw in meinem Pass steht Björn und bin 38 Jahre Jung und ich streame weil es mir einfach Spass macht ohne Druck und Zwang !!!! ... Als Plattform ist bei mir die PS4 an oberster Stelle, aber ich habe auch die PS3, WiiU und den PC im Angebot. Mein Zeitplan sieht wie folgt aus: In der Woche 1-2 Mal und am WE aufjedenfall und nach Bedarf auch noch bzw bei Release eines Games !! Zum aktuellen stand einfach in die Ankündigung oben im Chat schauen !!!!!!


Schaut auch auf meiner Homepage mal vorbei www.moep.ml Commandos - !platoon - !bfstats - !hp - !ts - !youtube

PC Setup: - AMD 8 Core @ 4 Ghz - Asus Mainboard - 8 GB Ram (kommen noch 8 dazu) - GTX 750 TI - Samsung SyncMaster P2270 - Samsung TFT - Phillips LED - Tritton AX Pro Plus - OBS @ 3500 kbit/s - Elgato Game Capture HD

livestream.media_description_md:
Seit kurzem ist mein neues Blog-Portal http://www.ab-gaming.de online, Ihr werdet dort neben regelmäigen Blogs zu Spielen und Neuigkeiten unter anderem auch ein Forum finden um die Themen zu diskutieren und das Portal wird auch als Anlaufstelle dieser tollen Community auf meinem Stream dienen. Ich möchte betonen, dass mir jeder Besucher von meinem Stream oder meinem Portal gleich wichtig ist. Natürlich freue ich mich trotzdem, wenn ihr unser Projekt unterstützt, unabhängig davon ob ihr dies direkt über eine Donation, unseren Amazon-Bestelllink oder unseren AB Gaming Shop macht. Da ich keinen festen Streamingplan habe, kündige ich unsere Events, Streamingabende und natürlich etwaige Gewinnspiele auf meinem Facebook-Channel an und freue mich natürlich darüber, wenn ihr diesem Channel beitretet und weitere für ihn begeistern könnt: AB Gaming Facebook Channel Planetkey.de bietet einen unbestechlichen und immer aktuellen Preisvergleich der neuesten und beliebtesten PC-Spiele. Neben PC-Spielen werden auch andere virtuelle Güter wie zum Beispiel Gamecards immer zum fairsten und besten Preis vergleichen. Euer Vorteil beim Kauf eines Online-Keys ist eine Ersparnis von 10-60% gegenüber handelsüblichen Preisen im Ladengeschäft. Aktuelle Informationen erhaltet ihr auf der Planetkey.de-Facebookseite.




Diese Community hat sicher immer durch ihr tolles Verhalten ausgezeichnet und dementsprechend freue ich mich euch auf unseren verschiedenen Plattformen begrüen zu dürfen. Ihr seid herzlich im Streamchat willkommen und könnt dort gerne Fragen stellen - dafür vergesst ihr nicht auf Follow zu drücken und mich weiterzuempfehlen. Donator:
Markus N. - 20 € / Markus W. - 5 €
Andreas J. - 20 € / Luca R. - 5 €
Christian H. - 15 € / Alessandro L. - 25 €
Marc R. - 20 € / Philipp R. - 20 €
David H. - 15 € / Heiko S. - 5 €
Danke an alle Donator!		 Wollt ihr auch in der streaming-freien Zeit nicht auf gepflegte Unterhaltung verzichten, solltet ihr zweifellos auch meinen Youtube-Channel abonnieren, auf dem ihr immer wieder neue aktuelle Videos zu verschiedenen Spielen, sowie einige Outtakes findet: AB Gaming Youtube-Channel
Feedback ist herzlich Willkommen!		 Aus persönlicher Sicht kann ich planetkey.de nur empfehlen und rate jedem einfach mal einen Blick auf das Portal zu werfen.

livestream.media_status: [Eng] Diamond Fizz Mid-  41-5 win loss ratio with viewers! Playing on my main New challenges to donate to!
livestream.media_description:
#Become a subscriber today! $5 a month! Become a drizzlet/sub today! [![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-32308593-image-0f3f7f6cccb8dcca-320-png_53f0dc99371fa.png "Subscribe")](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=8RX9XT9KKKHLL) [![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-32308593-image-68c2a674e6f055ef-320-png_53f0dd2df3dcc.png "Donate")](https://streamtip.com/t/drizzall)
Perks for subscribing: -Earn twice as many Drizzcoins as before! -100 bonus Drizzcoins as soon as you sign up! -Extra Drizzall love and attention!! -Spot on my friends list -Chances to star in my youtube videos -Special sub only days. -Sub emotes! -More to come! (open to ideas to reward you guys for your monetary love)

#Current Challenges!
_Make sure to say in the donation note what you are donating to or I will assume its generic!_
**The Wilyty Challenge**- First person to out-sub him (12 subs) gets a $25 RP card, donated by Wily!
**The Mandy/Koteczek/GF Challenge**- (22$/$100) at $100 dollars mandy will stream for an entire day, just for you guys.
**The Crossdressing Challenge**- ($0/$400) Once the goal is reached, I will wear a dress, wig, and even a full set of makeup. And stream for an entire day. (You damn perverts)
**The 24 Hour Challenge**-($0/$300) 24 hour stream of fun time sexiness.
Drinking W Drizzall ($50/$100) A nice long day of shots and drinking games with your favorite streamer!
**Terror Tuesday Challenge**- ($150/$150) This is a fundraiser to turn every tuesday into Terror Tuesday, which means scary games all day! I need a few new pieces of equipment first! Donate here to get this day going.
**Dunk Tank Challenge**-($0/$400) (Weather permitting, so do it soon!) I rent an entire dunk tank and stream for the day from it! You guys donate money to get either Mandy(my gf) or Tim(My roommate) to throw balls at the release! (I bet if we got a little extra in donations that day we could get them to sit in the tank for a game or two ;.))
**Mystery Canned Food Challenge**-($0/$100) You guys go with me to the market, and donate to me to buy certain cans that will be thrown into a group of other misc cans, they could be anything from fruit, to corn, to garlic, or whatever disgusting mashed crap you guys can bribe me into buying from the market, The nastier the can the harder I will haggle with you to put it in the pile. Afterward, I will stream for the day, and everytime you guys donated some small amount ($5ish) I would grab a random can, all the labels torn off, and eat a certain amount (Looking at 4-5 spoonfulls) And I would have to eat it immediately, before I could continue the game.(Looking into rigging a second webcam so you guys could choose the cans you want me to eat, maybe even 2 piles, Cheap and easy-$5, Nasty and scary,$10ish) Ask about this challenge!
**Ice Bath Challenge**-($0/$150)I spend the day sitting in a large bucket of water, you guys donate money to throw ice / hot water in (Prolly around $5 a bucket) I would of course be safe and healthy, I wouldnt kill myself for your enjoyment ;.P. Just maim.
**Human Canvas Challenge**($0/$100) Stream shirtless and you guys donate to have mandy write whatever you want on my body!(varies depending on where on my body you want to write. waist up, and how big you want to write, (My face is prime real estate! Gonna be more expensive!))
If you would like to add a challenge, tell me, we can discuss it, and if we can agree on a "end goal" and you can get $30 raised for it, via you and or others, I'll put it up here!

#-----Drizzcoins-----
Drizzcoins are a unique way to reward loyalty to my stream.
You earn Drizzcoins- Once every 15 minutes 10 for being here at the start or end for the stream Giveaway wheel Being helpful in chat Donating When I get drunk Subscribers earn more
You spend the Drizzcoins on Games with me twice weekly RP card giveaways More if the wheel lands on the RP card. Betting for more Monthly sub giveaways for big items(tablets, gaming mice/headsets, gunnars so on and so forth)

#-----Giveaways-----
Every monday wednesday and friday I give a 10 RP card out near the end of my stream. It uses a raffle system, so the more drizzcoins you have the better CHANCE you have of winning, Its not most coins win, just better chance.
Thats 3 RP cards a week, 12 a month, gauranteed.

#Top Donators!!! (Above $500) 1- $689 Starrymeadows, 2- $500 Hodensac, 3- $500 420Drizzt, 4- GreyGambit242 $981 5-$550 Wilyty

[![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-32308593-image-f0ad479ff98f3b73-320-png_53f0dcb79acef.png "Facebook")](https://www.facebook.com/Drizzall)[![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-32308593-image-fd80a0e144f3fee3-320-png_53f0dcea8e1ae.png "YouTube")](http://www.youtube.com/user/Drizzall88)[![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-32308593-image-f59d68807756c1cc-320-png_53f0dcdbb40b9.png "Twitter")](https://twitter.com/Drizzall)

"Geek Band Theory" (alias GBT) est un groupe composé actuellement de 14 streameurs/euses , vous trouverez ici plusieurs jeux, principalement du League of Legends mais aussi du Counter Strike : Global Offensive, Pokémon, Minecraft, Smite etc.


Vous pouvez suivre chacun des streameurs sur leurs chaînes perso en cliquant sur leur îcone dans l'onglet "geekbandtheory".***



Hi ! Welcome on Geek Band Theory TV.
"Geek Band Theory" (alias GBT) is a group composed of 14 streamers, you will find here different games on our streams, mainly League of Legends but also Counter Strike : Global Offensive, Pokemon, Minecraft, Smite etc.


You can follow every streamers on their TV by clicking on the tab "geekbandtheory".



![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/barre-gbt2-png_53efe481b919e.png "Long GBT")
[![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/facebook-broke-gbt-png_53ef9e31b1645.png "Facebook GBT")](https://www.facebook.com/GeekBandTheory/) [![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/twitter-gbt-png_53ef9e681e58d.png "Twitter GBT")](https://twitter.com/GeekBandTheory/) [![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/social-inside-youtube-icon-gbt-png_53ef9eaa63b85.png "Youtube GBT")](https://www.youtube.com/user/GeekBandTheory/)

![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/barre-don-2-png_53eff44094806.png "LongB Don")
[![alt text](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/paypaliconblacknegrojepeteuncable-png_53eff506597b9.png "Don NightyQS")](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=A6FJPM9WCYM72)



***Nous vous encourageons à venir discuter avec nous et tous les autres viewers sur le tchat à votre droite, nous répondons le plus possible à vos questions. Cela augmente l'interactivité du stream et le rend plus joyeux, vous contribuez ainsi à la renommée du stream et à son évolution, car soyons d'accord, un stream sans tchat c'est pas très intéressant ;)


Sur ce, nous vous remercions de nous suivre et de nous regarder, en espérant que cela vous plaise, ENJOY à tous et à toutes !***



We encourage you to come and talk with us and all the viewers on the tchat, we try to answer your questions as much as possible. It increases the interactivity of the stream and makes it more joyful and awesome ! You are a part of this stream and its evolution, because let me be honest, a stream without you is not very interesting ;)


Thank you for following and watching us, we hope that it pleases you, everyone : ENJOY !

livestream.media_description:
# ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/welcome-banner-jpg_53f17d9e98e05.jpg)

**Welcome to my channel!** I casually play games on here every now and then and sometimes do speedrun attempts. Mostly depends on what I'm in the mood for. For the most part, you should probably expect random Japanese games, RPGs, or whatever  just got released recently to be played on here. Feel free to ask about any future stream plans or random things you'd like to know about me. And again, welcome to my stream! ( ´ ▽ ` )ノ

##  
 
### ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/chat-rules-banner-jpg_53f17dc11b4f4.jpg)

 **1. Don't be rude.**
For the most part, I'm just a regularly chill person, trying to have a fun time. You're very welcome to swear as you wish, but I won't allow the usual racist slander, bigotry and generally unnecessary things people shouldn't be saying. Just please don't be offensive to other people as well as myself, and we'll all get along just fine. (๑•ᴗ•)و

**2. No Spoilers!**
I really love a good story in a video game, it's one of the main reasons I'll stick to a game for weeks at a time. So if you wanna be that guy who ruins the storyline experience for me and chat, you're going straight on my banlist and won't be coming off of it anytime soon.

**3.Keep Backseat Gaming to a minimum!**
If you see me stumbling around wondering where to go, I missed something hilarious, or something really complicated that the game doesn't explain comes up, you're very welcome to lead me in the right direction with a subtle hint/tip or a link to a guide explaining the very complicated system. (Example: This puzzle has something to do with counting.) Tips like these are very welcome in chat. Whenever the chat becomes overwhelmed by backseat gaming though, it becomes less watchable for the audience. When this happens, I'll usually end up pausing the game or just sitting still doing nothing, ask for advice constantly, then rely blindly on advice given to me over and over again. I'll then feel helplessly depend on chat, and repeat the boring process you saw in the previous section of this rule. So, let me play the game I came here to play, nobody wants to watch Chat Advice Simulator 2014. It's not a fun experience and hope you understand.

**4.Have fun, and be yourself!**
Think of this stream as a trip to a close friends house. Basically, I'll be treating you guys like a good friend of mine. So feel free to let loose, be yourself, and have as much fun as possible! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ

#### 

##### [![1000 Games Challenge](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/1000-games-challenge-jpg_53f1871a36069.jpg)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZoKue3m3-cDdAOeItpgHitVjWPPNgSiVRKr3PiHveIs/edit?pli=1#gid=0)

I became a video game collector around 2013. Throughout that time, I managed to acquire more than 1000 games physically and digitally. Throughout that whole year, I found myself playing games less and less. I figured, the best way to get my lazy ass to play games again, was to challenge myself to play them all.

# 

*Clicking the banner above will take you to a list of games I've beaten* **(NOT 100 PERCENTED)** *from start to finish during the 1000 Game Challenge.*

## 

### ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/links-banner-jpg_53f17df840c0b.jpg)

[**YouTube**](http://www.YouTube.com/SenpaiPlz) This YouTube page is where I'll be posting stream archive footage of the streams I have done in the past.

[**Twitter**](http://twitter.com/SenpaiPlzStream) You can follow me personally here if you'd like to know when I go live, or what game I plan to play ahead of time.

[**Facebook**](http://www.Facebook.com/SenpaiPlzStream) This is pretty much just an alternative to Twitter. I personally greatly prefer Twitter.

[**Group Channel**](http://www.YouTube.com/ReversedMushroom) Here's a link to my Let's Play Channel, Reversed Mushroom. I play a lot of different games with my friends. Games I play here that I beat after 4/20/2014 will also go on the 1000 Games Challenge list.

[**My Personal Twitter**](http://twitter.com/PulseEffects) This is my personal twitter where you can sorta get to know me better. I generally post my opinions on different Anime, Video Games, or just general topics that are trending. I'll also most likely re-tweet things I find funny or have a personal enjoyment *(example: Streams I like to watch, hilarious pictures, someone posting something weird, etc.)* .

[**My Anime List**](http://myanimelist.net/animelist/PulseEffects) If you're at all interested in knowing what Anime I'm watching or have watched in the past. This will take you to My Anime List where I normally update my progress daily on Anime.

[**Donations**](http://www.tinyurl.com/SenpaiPlzDonate) All donations are greatly appreciated! Any donations received go towards things such as improving recording & streaming equipment, requested games, helping me out in an emergency, keeping me alive, etc.

#### 

##### ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/about-me-banner-jpg_53f18cd5a7391.jpg)

Hi, I'm SenpaiPlz! I've gone by many usernames so feel free to refer to me as Senpai, Pulse, or Dak; whichever one you prefer is cool with me. I'm currently 22, and am fortunate enough to indulge into my many hobbies on a daily basis. I've played video games and watched anime for as long as I can remember. To this day, I still absolutely love them. RPGs are probably my favorite type of games; think about half my video game collection is filled with them. I also love series like Star Wars Kotor, Dragon Age, Mass Effect, Elder Scrolls, and a huge random assortment of Japanese games that were localized. If you have any questions, wanna know when I post a video, or when I'm live doing a stream; either ask me in chat, or follow my [Twitter](http://twitter.com/PulseEffects). I also have a [Facebook](http://www.Facebook.com/PulseEffects) if you prefer that.

C'est Adran. Joueur depuis bien avant ma première décennie, je continu à jouer dans la bonne humeur. (même si des fois c'est pas flagrant!)
Je stream de manière régulière sans avoir de planning, je ne m'impose pas de jeu et je cherche surtout à passer du bon temps en votre compagnie.

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/donateurs-jpg_53e7baef3b465.jpg)
Marina - 5€
Nicolas - 2€ | If you are english speaking, welcome on the channel! I speak french and I will speak french most of the time because it's the main language of my audience!
Sorry about that. But you can speak with me and other english speaking people on the chat, I will (and I hope) they will answer! :)
Hope you will have a fun time here!

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/reseauxsociaux-jpg_53e5fa5ea73ed.jpg)
Vous pouvez me retrouver sur les réseaux sociaux les plus courants tel que : [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/AdranmelechPublic), [Twitter](http://twitter.com/adranmelech), [Google+](http://google.fr/+adranmelech)
Sinon, je suis aussi sur [YouTube](http://www.youtube.com/Adranmelech) et j'ai un [site internet](http://adranmelech.fr/)!.
| Quand est ce que le stream se terminera?
Lorsque j'en aurais décidé. Je n'ai pas d'horaire fixe, ni de durée prédéterminé. (Sauf exception, bien entendu)


Pourquoi est ce qu'on ne peux pas choisir la qualité du stream?
Tout simplement car c'est une option disponible que pour les partenaires Hitbox.

Est ce que tu peux changer de jeu?
Vous pouvez toujours proposer. Mais la réponse sera souvent non.

Est ce qu'on peut revoir les lives?
Oui, tout les replays sont disponibles à [cette adresse](http://www.dailymotion.com/Adranmelech).

Peut-on faire un don?
Oui, [en cliquant sur cette phrase](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XS8KDY378LJVE), vous n'êtes bien évidemment pas obligé de donner (Heureusement!). Si vous êtes plus graphique que lien cliquable, un bouton est disponible juste en dessous.

Que comptes tu faire de nos dons?
Les dons me serviront à acheter du meilleur matériel (Mon rêve en ce moment est une carte d'acquisition PC, mais une bonne, pas une AverMedia qui m'a tenu 3 mois.)

[![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/don-jpg_53e5fc1d0fa4d.jpg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XS8KDY378LJVE) |

livestream.media_description:
Welcome, we've been doing this since the summer of 2013 and we're trying to build a friendly community based around gaming and having fun while gaming! If there's anything you would like to know that isn't here then feel free to ask us in chat or get in contact with us on social media! just click any of the images you see below!



**Scheduled stream times! (Times in BST)**

Mondays = 7:30 PM

Tuesdays = 7:30 PM

Wednesdays = 7:30 PM

Fridays = 10:30 PM

Saturday = 7:30 PM

Sunday = 7:30 PM



No scheduled stream for **Thursday** however on the odd occasion we may stream! so follow us here & on twitter to know when we go live! ___ Click any of these images to go to one of our social media websites where you can send us a message or even play games with us and other GFG Fans!

[![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finalyt-jpg_53ef059fc84b0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/user/GoldenfangGaming) [![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finalsteam-jpg_53ef06fdc90e6.jpg)](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/GFGFans) [![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finaltwitter-jpg_53ef060726e51.jpg)](https://twitter.com/FearDaFang) [![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finaldonate-jpg_53ef05e5af264.jpg)](https://streamtip.com/h/goldenfanggaming) ___ ![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finalts3-jpg_53ef090495fce.jpg)

IP Address: __85.236.100.85:18247__

Password: __goldenfanggaming__ ___ [![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finalrules-jpg_53ef0b90e96b2.jpg)

__PLEASE__ Read the rules for yourself & others in chat!

Meowbot handles most of the infringements and there is rarely any punishment for meowbot timeouts other than the set timeout period (600 seconds) for example if you get timed out by the bot, we don't mind and there's no hard feelings its just something that happened! No problem just dont do it again! otherwise meowbot will get you again haha!. __HOWEVER__ if a mod actively has to step in due to you breaking a rule you will be timed out ONCE then banned with no chance of an appeal. So please read the rules :) Thank you



__1)__ Please ask a MOD or the streamer for permission to post a link! :)

__2)__ Unless i ask for help absolutely __NO__ backseating / spoilers / questions or discussions that may lead to spoilers - if in doubt ask!

__3)__ Treat others with respect in chat, people have a right to enjoy the stream a safe & fun environment and we provide that so please treat others how you would like to be treated.

__4) ABSOLUTELY ZERO__ Sexist / Racist or Homophobic comments or jokes of bad taste e.g. Rape jokes etc... Seriously don't.

__5)__ This is a gaming channel first and foremost so keep that in mind when talking about topics! we like discussions but if something ever goes to far you'll be asked to stop and move it along

__6)__ Please be respectful of everyone and their age when talking in chat! We're certainly not PG13 but we're also not 18+ Be reasonable, and just think before you type!

__7)__ If a MOD or the streamer asks you to move on from a topic / stop what you are doing. Please do it otherwise you will probably be banned quicker than you can type your next message.

__8)__ No Religious / Political Hate, sometimes religion and politics may come up, in discussion and that is fine. Just please be respectful of everyone and their opinions

__9)__ MODS __can__ Ban you without a timeout before if they believe it is justified, i trust them fully and they don't need to ask me, please respect them and listen to them

__10)__ Do __NOT__ Make an alternative account if you are banned. Please don't if you do make an alt account, it will be banned too ___ [![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/finalspecs-jpg_53ef0c5b943db.jpg)

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-22074681-image-3a848bd821b524f7-320-jpeg_54202bd447180.jpeg)

Hei...

Amsomnia Studios is created and owned by Michael Petersen. Amsomnia Studios covers many different things. Here on the streams you will be able to see many various playings as well as come with requests.

Be ready to be part of a interactive stream where you get to choose most options in games or control what I have to do.

Remember to be nice and as I have no true schedule don't expect anything completely structured, if you are okay with this you are ready to join:)

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-22074681-image-03c373e4ba9ccbe6-320-jpeg_54202c1550b69.jpeg)

Yes! if you want to and if you enjoy my show here on Twitch please subcribe to me as in follow me...Please also consider subcribing to my main hub on Youtube.

http://www.youtube.com/user/AmsomniaStudios

You will find on Youtube many different reviews and videos, plus any video you see here on twitch.tv will be uploaded on youtube so you won't miss anything...

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-22074681-image-a36862bc1e6ebf06-320-jpeg_54202c3681c9f.jpeg)

You can requests games for me to play, if I have the game I will do it on the stream. Please just keep in mind I don't own every game in the world haha...

You can requests games using this link and this link alone. Living-Next-Door@hotmail.com.

I will be browsing your emails often so don't worry I will see it and I will give a notice... Plus if you want to be reminded of the day when I am streaming the game you requested or if I can't I will be writing back to your mail!

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-22074681-image-55937b19ab7a5a68-320-jpeg_54202c5a0f1e7.jpeg)

I have two days that are scheduled, you can look them up in one of the boxes down below here on twitch!

I like to just come up with a day where I just do something. It's really a double edged sword, simply because it means that sometimes I won't be streaming and most times if you ask me to stream something I will.

It means that your voice is heard as long as I have the time to be able to stream. I work and I am studying to become a teacher so my time is a little weird set up, plus I am from Denmark so my time code might be a little different for some....

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/panel-22074681-image-588da35221977c1f-320-png_54202c75f2fc4.png)](https://www.youtube.com/user/AmsomniaStudios)

[![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.â€¦panel-22074681-image-9920d3c5afa2994d-320-jpeg_54202f428c64b.jpeg)

This is the first scheduled program. The idea here is that I play Playstation games for the first 1-2 hours and then after that play MS-DOS games for the next 1-2 hours. Each video will be uploaded up on Youtube for your viewing pleasure...

Join me at 20 or 21 a clock to watch my stream each saturday!

![img](http://edge.sf.hitbox.tv/static/img/channel/sky-touching-wallpapers-buildings-city-clouds-fffffacebook-timeline-images-jpg_5427e36d18efd.jpg)

Emulation Sundays is a schedule where I will be playing all kinds of emulated games. Each second week I will play Pokemon Games, we are starting with Pokemon Blue and then I will be completeting each one as we go along. 

I will play many of the weird emulated games as well as standard fare. When I play it will always be noted on youtube on my channel Amsomnia Studios and it will always be noted at least an hour before I begin!

However I usually do this at 19:00 or 20:00 a clock!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Cześć! Mam na imię Piotr, mam 16 lat (98') i streamuję dla portalu  [How2Play.pl](http://how2play.pl "How2Play!"). Jestem streamerem od ok. 2 miesięcy. Kliknij follow, daj like na [Facebooku](http://facebook.com/CptWard "Fanpage!") i zostań na dłużej! 
[![H2P](http://i.imgur.com/Q6InnFC.png")](http://how2play.pl/)

[![Dotacja](http://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/jtv_user_pictures/panel-62097828-image-7ff204932d5496ff-320.png "Dotacja")](https://streamtip.com/h/cptward) Każda dotacja powyżej 1 zł jest wyświetlana na streamie. Dotacje są dobrowolne i można przeprowadzać je jedynie przez Paypala.

[![Facebook](http://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/jtv_user_pictures/panel-62097828-image-8b5797a685809dd6-320.png "Facebook")](https://facebook.com/CptWard) Na Facebooku ogłaszam wszystkie streamy więc jeśli chcesz być na bieżąco to kliknij Like!

[![YouTube](http://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/jtv_user_pictures/panel-62097828-image-9e20a8d7914787c5-320.png "YouTube")](https://youtube.com/user/CptWard) Na YouTube lądują (ciekawe) materiały ze streama, jest również dużo bonusowych materiałów z gier, które nie pojawiają się na streamie.

[![G2A](http://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/jtv_user_pictures/panel-62097828-image-ee5e09f4a279e959-320.png "G2A")](https://www.g2a.com/r/cpt-ward) Kupując grę z G2A poprzez ten link pozwalasz mi zarobić. Mam również kilka kodów na zniżkę, które będą rzucane na czacie.
